title: Ricooking
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Waah, Ama~zing. Riko-chan, the way you dress your food is so cute~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Eh? I-, is that so? But I’m no match for you, Kanata-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>That’s not true at all! You’re really skilled with your fingers. I wonder if it’s because you play the Piano?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Aren’t they unrelated?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>But, it’s important to have a good sense of your fingers for the Piano, right? If so, then won’t you become pretty skilled with your fingers?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu. I’m kind of happy if I’m skilled at dressing food because of my beloved Piano….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hey hey, can you do Kanata’s too~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Alright, leave it to me<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ricooking, please help~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Ahaha. Don’t say stuff like Ai-chan~. My hands will tremble from laughing<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
